en-US.summary: Listen to a comfortable environment, less distractions, more productivity.
en-US.name: work neighborhood
en-US.description:
Listen to a comfortable environment, with less distractions, and more productivity.

work neighborhood provides a high quality working environment.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch work neighborhood" or "Alexa, launch work neighborhood" to start the work neighborhood".

At anytime, you can stop the work neighborhood by saying "Alexa, stop"

fr-FR.summary: Ecoutez Ma neighborhood, moins de bla bla, plus de la la la.
examplePhrases: Alexa, demande à Ma neighborhood de démarrer
fr-FR.name: Ma neighborhood
fr-FR.description:
Ecoutez Ma neighborhood, moins de bla bla, plus de la la la

Ma neighborhood vous donne le meilleur son, 24h sur 24h

Pour démarrer, dites juste : "Alexa, lance Ma neighborhood" ou "Alexa, démarre ma neighborhood"".

A n'importe quel moment, vous pouvez dire "Alexa, stop" pour arrêter.

examplePhrases: Alexa, pide a mi neighborhood poner la neighborhood
Alexa, pide a mi neighborhood reproducir
es-ES.name: Mi neighborhood
es-ES.description:
Escucha Mi neighborhood.

Para empezar, solo tienes que decir "Alexa, abre mi neighborhood" o "Alexa, pide a mi neighborhood poner la neighborhood".

En cualquier momento, tu puedes parar la neighborhood diciendo "Alexa, para"

examplePhrases: Alexa, pide a mi neighborhood poner la neighborhood
Alexa, pide a mi neighborhood reproducir
es-MX.name: Mi neighborhood
es-MX.description:
Escucha Mi neighborhood.

Para empezar, solo tienes que decir "Alexa, abre mi neighborhood" o "Alexa, pide a mi neighborhood poner la neighborhood".

En cualquier momento, tu puedes parar la neighborhood diciendo "Alexa, para"

examplePhrases: Alexa, chiedi a la mia neighborhood di avviare la neighborhood
Alexa, chiedi a la mia neighborhood di giocare
it-IT.name: La Mia neighborhood
it-IT.description:
Ascolta La Mia neighborhood.

Per iniziare, basta dire "Alexa, apri La Mia neighborhood" o "Alexa, chiedi a la mia neighborhood di avviare la neighborhood".

In qualsiasi momento, puoi interrompere la neighborhood dicendo "Alexa, basta"
